## Introduction

Naomi Suzuki is a 3rd year Statistics and Data Science student at UCLA. She is passionate about social justice and is involved in the Nikkei Student Union, Kyodo Taiko, and Daily Bruin. Outside of school, she works at a cafe on campus and enjoys playing taiko, listening to music, and reading.
